text: Xometry is an on-demand industrial parts marketplace founded in 2013. It is based in Gaithersburg, Maryland and has raised a total of $113 million in venture capital funding. Its CEO and co-founder is Randy Altschuler and some of its customers include BMW and General Electric. ==History== In December 2019, Xometry acquired Shift, a Munich based on-demand manufacturing marketplace, which will now be known as Xometry Europe. ==References== Category:Companies based in Gaithersburg, Maryland Category:Privately held companies based in Maryland
title: Xometry
